reviewText: The video was shot and edited in HD 1080p. The color stills (photos) are from the video shot on the grounds of the Sorg Mansion in the spring and summer of 2013. Black and white photos are from the archives of Midpoint Library. The majority of the research is from the local level and not from the internet as you will see in the closing credits.

A little pricey for what you get, which is mostly information and pictures freely available on the Internet, including most of the pictures, which a often too low a quality to enjoy.  The personal remembrances from living there were nice, but the audio was hollow and echoey.  Net, if you grew of with the Sorg, it's a nice to have.
